item.title: Jeff add a quote by LeGrand Richards
item.description: "For Every worry under the sun there is a remedy or there is none; if there is a remedy hurry and find it. If there is none never mind it." -- LeGrand Richards

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Jack Vance
item.description: "Notice this rent in my garment; I am at a loss to explain its presence! I am even more puzzled by the existence of the universe." -- Jack Vance

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Jack Vance
item.description: "What are your fees?" inquired Guyal cautiously. "I respond to three questions," stated the augur. "For twenty terces I phrase the answer in clear and actionable language; for ten I use the language of cant, which occasionally admits of ambiguity; for five, I speak a parable which you must interpret as you will; and for one terce, I babble in an unknown tongue." -- Jack Vance

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Jack Vance
item.description: "Good music always defeats bad luck." -- Jack Vance

item.title: Jeff add a quote by jack vance
item.description: "Beauty is a luster which love bestows to guile the eye. Therefore it may be said that only when the brain is without love will the eye look and see no beauty." -- jack vance

item.title: Jeff add a quote by Jack Vance
item.description: "Cease the bickering! I am indulging the exotic whims of a beautiful princess and must not be distracted." -- Jack Vance
